products.name: iPhone 15 (Black, 128 GB)
products.description: The Apple iPhone 15 comes with the latest A16 Bionic chip, dual camera system, and Ceramic Shield for durability.

products.name: Galaxy S23 5G (Phantom Black, 128 GB)
products.description: The Samsung Galaxy S23 5G offers a stunning display and triple-camera setup powered by Snapdragon 8 Gen 2.

products.name: Pixel 8a (Obsidian, 256 GB)
products.description: Google Pixel 8a brings an enhanced camera and Pixel-exclusive AI features to deliver exceptional performance.

products.name: OnePlus 11R 5G (Galactic Silver, 256 GB)
products.description: The OnePlus 11R 5G features ultra-fast charging, a powerful Snapdragon processor, and immersive AMOLED display.

products.name: Vivo T3 Ultra (Lunar Gray, 256 GB)
products.description: The Vivo T3 Ultra combines style with performance, featuring a high-resolution camera and long-lasting battery.

products.name: Realme GT 3 (Nitro Blue, 256 GB)
products.description: The Realme GT 3 is a powerful gaming phone with lightning-fast performance and ultra-fast charging.

products.name: Redmi Note 12 Pro  (Arctic White, 64 GB)
products.description: Redmi Note 12 Pro 5G features a flagship-grade camera and 120Hz AMOLED display at an affordable price.

products.name: Poco X5 Pro 5G (Astral Black, 256 GB)
products.description: Poco X5 Pro 5G is a versatile smartphone that offers a smooth display and impressive battery life.
